##### <a name="-victoriametrics--systemd--unit--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent', 'file']`



Default value: `'present'`

##### <a name="-victoriametrics--systemd--unit--path"></a>`path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `'/etc/systemd/system'`

##### <a name="-victoriametrics--systemd--unit--settings"></a>`settings`

Data type: `Optional[Hash]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-victoriametrics--systemd--unit--owner"></a>`owner`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `'root'`

##### <a name="-victoriametrics--systemd--unit--group"></a>`group`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `'root'`

##### <a name="-victoriametrics--systemd--unit--mode"></a>`mode`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `'0444'`

##### <a name="-victoriametrics--systemd--unit--show_diff"></a>`show_diff`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-victoriametrics--systemd--unit--enable"></a>`enable`

Data type: `Optional[Variant[Boolean, Enum['mask']]]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-victoriametrics--systemd--unit--active"></a>`active`

Default value: `undef`

## Data types

### <a name="Victoriametrics--File"></a>`Victoriametrics::File`

The Victoriametrics::File data type.

Alias of

```puppet
Struct[{
    path  => Stdlib::AbsolutePath,
    owner => String,
    group => String,
    mode  => Pattern[/^\d{4}/],
  }]
```

### <a name="Victoriametrics--Storage_node--Hostname"></a>`Victoriametrics::Storage_node::Hostname`

The Victoriametrics::Storage_node::Hostname data type.

Alias of `Pattern[/\A(([a-zA-Z]|[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\-]*[a-zA-Z0-9])\.)*([A-Za-z]|[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9\-]*[A-Za-z0-9])(:(?=\d))?((6553[0-5])|(655[0-2][0-9])|(65[0-4][0-9]{2})|(6[0-4][0-9]{3})|([1-5][0-9]{4})|([0-5]{0,5})|([0-9]{1,4}))?\z\z/]`

### <a name="Victoriametrics--Storage_node--V4"></a>`Victoriametrics::Storage_node::V4`

The Victoriametrics::Storage_node::V4 data type.

Alias of `Pattern[/\A([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])(\.([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])){3}(:(?=\d))?((6553[0-5])|(655[0-2][0-9])|(65[0-4][0-9]{2})|(6[0-4][0-9]{3})|([1-5][0-9]{4})|([0-5]{0,5})|([0-9]{1,4}))?\z/]`

### <a name="Victoriametrics--Storage_node--V6"></a>`Victoriametrics::Storage_node::V6`

The Victoriametrics::Storage_node::V6 data type.

Alias of `Pattern[/\A([[:xdigit:]]{1,4}:){6}([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])(\.([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])){3}(:(?=\d))?((6553[0-5])|(655[0-2][0-9])|(65[0-4][0-9]{2})|(6[0-4][0-9]{3})|([1-5][0-9]{4})|([0-5]{0,5})|([0-9]{1,4}))?\z/, /\A([[:xdigit:]]{1,4}:){5}:([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])(\.([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])){3}(:(?=\d))?((6553[0-5])|(655[0-2][0-9])|(65[0-4][0-9]{2})|(6[0-4][0-9]{3})|([1-5][0-9]{4})|([0-5]{0,5})|([0-9]{1,4}))?\z/, /\A([[:xdigit:]]{1,4}:){4}(:[[:xdigit:]]{1,4}){0,1}:([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])(\.([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])){3}(:(?=\d))?((6553[0-5])|(655[0-2][0-9])|(65[0-4][0-9]{2})|(6[0-4][0-9]{3})|([1-5][0-9]{4})|([0-5]{0,5})|([0-9]{1,4}))?\z/, ### <a name="Victoriametrics--Storage_node_entry"></a>`Victoriametrics::Storage_node_entry`
